title: The approving / sanctioning authority for the building plans under the URS shall be the Municipal Commissioner as per the M
clause_text: The approving / sanctioning authority for the building plans under the URS shall be the Municipal Commissioner as per the M.R. & T.P. Act, 1966, even if the URS partly consists of declared slums or slums on Municipal / Govt. lands, existing prior to 1stJanuary, 1995 or such other reference date as may be notified by the Government.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements â€“
